name: Return To Earth (itch) (rohin)
description:
"There are two types of animals in this world. Those with nails in their heads, and those with hammers..."

Eons ago humanity fled a dying and polluted earth. Millions of years later you, a descendant of those Earth survivors, return to what was once Earth to repair and restore the planet to support life again. Your ship is equipped with equipment the tools to bring life back to Earth, but you must maintain a balance between the species so they can flourish into the future.

Team
Tim Atkin - Programming
Victor Chanil Park - Art
Rohin Knight - Art

TIP: If not all text is visible on screen, make game full screen.
